Class Menu

java.lang.Object
Menu
public class Menu extends Object
This class contains all the information of the main menu

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Menu(DataStore dataStore)
    Creates a Movie object with the given name, synopsis, director, casts, show times, movie type, release rating, showing status and duration.
